title: Theodore Roosevelt Island: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations       Ranger-led programs on the island are free and do not require a reservation. If you would like to bring a group of 10 or more people on a program, please call 703‑289‑2553 to let a ranger know. Permits are required for certain activities within the park such as:  Driving commercial vehicles on park roads Weddings Any activities in which participants are paying to participate, such as tours or classes Religious services and ceremonies Funeral and memorial ceremonies Filming in the park Non-vehicular commercial activities in the park
